name: Neon City Cyber Cat Lounge
description:
An ambient music generator set in a futuristic abandoned city. As cats wander randomly around the room, they trigger music plates to generate melancholic ambient electronic music accompanied by the rain outside.

For fans of the Blade Runner soundtrack, cats, and relaxing...

Controls:

  • Escape opens menu
  • Numbers 1-5 select cat camera
  • Letters A-E select room camera
  • Tab for mouse-look camera
